episodes.summary: Today we answer some great questions by podcast listeners about investing. We cover RMD, asset allocation, asset location, free brokers, the fiduciary rule and a whole lot more.

episodes.title: DR 251: Bond Investing
episodes.summary: In the final installment in our series of How to Build Wealth on Any Income we look at bond investing.

episodes.title: DR 250: REITs & Commodities

episodes.title: DR 246: HBWAI--Asset Allocation Overview
episodes.summary: In our continuing series on How to Build Wealth on Any Income, today we start a deep dive into asset allocation and how to build a solid investment plan.

episodes.title: DR 245: Why does the stock market go up?
episodes.summary: In our series on How to Build Wealth on Any Income, today we look at what drives stock prices. So often investors see the market as a game, at best. The reality is that behind every stock mutual fund or ETF are real live businesses working to earn a profit. And it's ultimately profits that drive the direction of stock prices.

episodes.title: DR 244: 7 Things That Affect Investment Returns
episodes.summary: In our series on How to Build Wealth on Any Income, we look at the 7 things that affect investment returns.

episodes.title: DR 243: The Power of Small Differences in Investment Returns
episodes.summary: We look at the importance of investment returns for generating wealth, and how even small differences in returns can have a huge difference on your wealth.

episodes.title: DR 242: HWBAI--How Time Affects Investments
episodes.summary: In our continuing series on How to Build Wealth on Any Income, we look at time, and the importance of investing as early as possible.

episodes.title: DR 241: HBWAI--6 Thoughts on Spending Less than You Make
episodes.summary: We cover six ideas on how to spend less than you make, including the value of life experiments and the spending audit.

episodes.title: DR 240: HBWAI--How Much Should You Save?
episodes.summary: Continuing our series on how to build wealth on any income, today we look at the important question of how much should you save.

episodes.title: DR 239: HBWAI - Q&A
episodes.summary: Today in our series on how to build wealth on any income, we answer your questions on everything from 401ks to future stock market returns

episodes.title: DR 238: HBWAI--The Power of Small Amounts of Money
episodes.summary: Continuing our series on how to build wealth on any income, today we explore the incredible power of small amounts of money if invested over time.

episodes.title: DR 237: How to Build Wealth on Any Income--Compounding
episodes.summary: Continuing our series on how to build wealth on any income, we look at the power of compounding.

episodes.title: DR 236: How to Build Wealth on Any Income
episodes.summary: In part one of our series on how to build wealth on any income, we look at the importance of the net worth statement. We explore how our monthly budget affects our net worth, and the importance of compounding.

episodes.title: DR 235: 2016 Recap
episodes.summary: We talk about 2016, a BHAG for 2017, net worth updates, your most frequently asked questions, and what to look forward to in 2017.

episodes.title: DR 234 - Understanding Investment Fees
episodes.summary: One percent doesn't seem like much. But pay an investment advisor 1% a year and it could easily cost your more than $1 million over a lifetime of investing. In this podcast, we look at why investment fees matter.

episodes.title: DR 233: Should You Borrow to Pay Off Credit Card Debt
episodes.summary: We respond to a listener's question about credit card debt. She wants to know if it makes sense to take out a personal loan to pay off four credit cards. We talk about why it can be a good move, but also a significant risk.

episodes.title: DR 232: Evaluating a 401k Asset Allocation Plan
episodes.summary: A listener named Steve is making some important investment decisions in his 401k. While we can't give him any specific advice, we use his choices to talk about common issues facing all retirement investors.

episodes.title: DR 231: Credit Card Merchant Category Codes
episodes.summary: We look at credit card merchant category codes and how they affect cash back rewards. We also talk about 4 cash back card strategies.

episodes.title: DR 230: 11 Surprising Facts about Health Savings Accounts (HSA)
episodes.summary: Health Savings Accounts offer a tax advantaged way to pay for medical expenses. They only apply with high deductible health insurance plans. But if you have one, they can be used for everything from emergencies to retirement. We explain how in this episode.

episodes.title: DR 229: How Rising Interest Rates Affect Bond Investing
episodes.summary: With interest rates on the rise, we respond to a listener's question about bond investing. Specifically, should we avoid bonds now until we are comfortable that rates won't rise further.

episodes.title: DR 228: 4 Good Reasons to Refinance a Mortgage
episodes.summary: Refinancing a mortgage can be a great way to save money. While falling interest rates often spark a refi frenzy, there are other reasons to refinance a mortgage. We look at the 4 key times refinancing can make sense and how to evaluate the cost savings.
